com.bigdata.search

Interface ConfigurableAnalyzerFactory.AnalyzerOptions

  • Enclosing class:
    ConfigurableAnalyzerFactory

    public static interface ConfigurableAnalyzerFactory.AnalyzerOptions
    Options understood by analyzers created by ConfigurableAnalyzerFactory. These options are appended to the RFC 4647 language range

    • Field Summary

    • Field Detail

      • ANALYZER_CLASS

        static final String ANALYZER_CLASS
        If specified this is the fully qualified name of a subclass of Analyzer that has appropriate constructors. This is set implicitly if some of the options below are selected (for example PATTERN). For each configured language range, if it is not set, either explicitly or implicitly, then LIKE must be specified.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LIKE

        static final String LIKE
        The value of this property is a language range, for which an analyzer is defined. Treat this language range in the same way as the specified language range. LIKE loops are not permitted. If this is option is specified for a language range, then no other option is permitted.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • STOPWORDS

        static final String STOPWORDS
        The value of this property is one of:
        STOPWORDS_VALUE_NONE
        This analyzer is used without stop words.
        STOPWORDS_VALUE_DEFAULT
        Use the default setting for stopwords for this analyzer. It is an error to set this value on some analyzers such as SimpleAnalyzer that do not supprt stop words.
        A fully qualified class name
        ... of a subclass of Analyzer which has a static method getDefaultStopSet(), in which case, the returned set of stop words is used.
        If the ANALYZER_CLASS does not support stop words then any value other than STOPWORDS_VALUE_NONE is an error. If the ANALYZER_CLASS does support stop words then the default value is STOPWORDS_VALUE_DEFAULT
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • STOPWORDS_VALUE_DEFAULT

        static final String STOPWORDS_VALUE_DEFAULT
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • STOPWORDS_VALUE_NONE

        static final String STOPWORDS_VALUE_NONE
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PATTERN

        static final String PATTERN
        The value of the pattern parameter to PatternAnalyzer.PatternAnalyzer(Version, Pattern, boolean, Set) (Note the Pattern.UNICODE_CHARACTER_CLASS flag is enabled). It is an error if a different analyzer class is specified.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • WORD_BOUNDARY

        static final String WORD_BOUNDARY
        The value of the wordBoundary parameter to TermCompletionAnalyzer.TermCompletionAnalyzer(Pattern, Pattern, Pattern, boolean) (Note the Pattern.UNICODE_CHARACTER_CLASS flag is enabled). It is an error if a different analyzer class is specified.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SUB_WORD_BOUNDARY

        static final String SUB_WORD_BOUNDARY
        The value of the subWordBoundary parameter to TermCompletionAnalyzer.TermCompletionAnalyzer(Pattern, Pattern, Pattern, boolean) (Note the Pattern.UNICODE_CHARACTER_CLASS flag is enabled). It is an error if a different analyzer class is specified.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SOFT_HYPHENS

        static final String SOFT_HYPHENS
        The value of the softHyphens parameter to TermCompletionAnalyzer.TermCompletionAnalyzer(Pattern, Pattern, Pattern, boolean) (Note the Pattern.UNICODE_CHARACTER_CLASS flag is enabled). It is an error if a different analyzer class is specified.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ALWAYS_REMOVE_SOFT_HYPHENS

        static final String ALWAYS_REMOVE_SOFT_HYPHENS
        The value of the alwaysRemoveSoftHypens parameter to TermCompletionAnalyzer.TermCompletionAnalyzer(Pattern, Pattern, Pattern, boolean) (Note the Pattern.UNICODE_CHARACTER_CLASS flag is enabled). It is an error if a different analyzer class is specified.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_ALWAYS_REMOVE_SOFT_HYPHENS

        static final boolean DEFAULT_ALWAYS_REMOVE_SOFT_HYPHENS
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_SUB_WORD_BOUNDARY

        static final Pattern DEFAULT_SUB_WORD_BOUNDARY
        The default sub-word boundary is a pattern that never matches, i.e. there are no sub-word boundaries.
